46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that the Messenger of Allah said:"(The thief's hand) is not to be cut off except for the price of a shield, one-third of a Dinar or half of Dinar, or more

chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from Az-Zuhri
